title: Faith
description: When Rockstar Orlando Blue falls on troubled times after skipping rehab, he finds himself in hiding away in a small Welsh village. Hoping to find himself, hoping to learn from his past mistakes, but some mistakes will always haunt him. Will his friends and band members forgive him, and can he save his career?One day Faith Morgan the brown eyed beautiful girl enters his life, and everything changes forever but can the sex driven, womanising, controlling power driven man really love? Or will he always be haunted by his traumatic childhood. Orlando needs to learn to trust himself, and to learn to have just a little faith. Orlando Blue moves to Wales after quitting rehab he has a troubled past and his haunted by his childhood, he meets Faith together but can they work through his addictions and the issues of his past but can their relationship survive?
author: Sarah J. Fox
